content.text:
# List of presidents of Louisiana Tech University

This is a list of people who have served as president of Louisiana Tech University, via the [http://www.latech.edu/specialcollections Louisiana Tech Department of Special Collections, Archives, and Manuscripts].
*Arthur T. Prescott (1895–1899)
*W. C. Robinson (1899–1900)
*James B. Aswell (1900–1904)
*W. E. Taylor (1904–1905)
*C. E. Byrd (1906–1907)
*John E. Keeny (1908–1926)
*John R. Conniff (1927–1928)
*George W. Bond (1929–1936)
*Edwin Richardson (1936–1941)
*Claybrook Cottingham (1941–1949)
*Ralph L. Ropp (1949–1962)
*F. Jay Taylor (1962–1987)
*Dan Reneau (1987–2013)
*Les Guice (2013–2023)
*Jim Henderson (2023–present)
References
